DOC.detailed_description: This study aim describe delivery lifestyle model old adult . Return Everyday Activities Community Home ( REACH ) health promotion program aim middle-aged older adult . The goal REACH reduce sedentary behaviour , increase physical activity , increase strength balance . The REACH program comprise six session include evidence-based education , behaviour change theory , activity instruction . REACH also teach goal set technique , mindfulness , encourage active community engagement . In study run REACH program woman age 55 old alongside supplementary optional walk program run SportMedBC . We gather pre- post-intervention measure program perception , delivery psychological variable physical performance outcome . We also collect participant feedback course delivery , content effect throughout program . This study allow u describe delivery strategy REACH involve participant development REACH program . The optional walking program emphasize importance increase daily physical activity .
DOC.criteria: Participants include woman age 55 old . Participants must speak English . Participants must able walk minimum four city block , climb flight stair take part physical activity walk program . Participants must clear health care professional participate use Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Everyone ( ParQ+ ) assessment determine physically able take part activity program . Individuals exclude men , age 55 and/or speak English .
